backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no implemented logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing UI layering fixes and Leaflet stacking-context adjustments with related files and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-written summaries describing all major frontend files, including styling, components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base setup with extensive OKLCH theme variables and global styles for light/dark mode.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading Leaflet assets and bootstrapping the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: App wrapper applying theme support and rendering the EarthquakeDashboard.
frontend/src/components/earthquake/Dashb: Summary cards displaying total events, significant events, and largest quake details.
frontend/src/components/earthquake/Earth: Modal dialog showing detailed earthquake metadata with high z-index overlay for proper stacking above Leaflet.
Leaflet-based map component rendering earthquake markers with popups, click handling, and z-index-safe container.
Displays a table of earthquake events with magnitude badges, location, time, depth, and external links, supporting row selection.
frontend/src/components/earthquake/FeedA: Provides UI controls for time window selection, magnitude filtering, text search, and data refresh actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, including login, logout, and identity persistence via an auth client.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file noting that USGS data fetching is handled elsewhere.
frontend/src/hooks/useUsgsEarthquakes.ts: Fetches USGS earthquake feed data using react-query with periodic refresh and time‑window‑based caching.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind-based global styles, light/dark themes, and Leaflet z-index rules for map layering.
frontend/src/lib/earthquakeFilters.ts: Provides functions to filter earthquake features by magnitude and location and apply combined filters.
frontend/src/lib/earthquakeStats.ts: Computes basic stats from earthquake data, including totals, threshold counts, and max magnitude event.
frontend/src/lib/fetchJson.ts: Fetches a URL and returns parsed JSON, throwing an error on non‑OK responses.
frontend/src/lib/formatters.ts: Formats timestamps, magnitudes, depths, and coordinates into user‑friendly strings.
frontend/src/lib/leafletTypes.ts: Defines TypeScript types for Leaflet usage, checks for Leaflet availability, and creates magnitude‑styled map markers.
frontend/src/lib/usgsFeeds.ts: Provides USGS feed URL generation, time‑window options, and helper functions for magnitude labels and color mapping.
frontend/src/lib/usgsTypes.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for USGS earthquake GeoJSON data, filter types, and time window options.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/EarthquakeDashboard.t: Implements the main earthquake dashboard with filtering, data fetching, view modes, stats, and detail dialogs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, typography, animations, and content scanning for the project.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, requirements, architectural notes, and known issues for the earthquake app.
